verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] starting to wonder if it was a mistake to trust an aging , loudmouth New Yorker like Rudy Giuliani with a job as important as president of the United States ’s lawyer .
Donald Trump is [V: starting] [ARG1: to wonder if it was a mistake to trust an aging , loudmouth New Yorker like Rudy Giuliani with a job as important as president of the United States ’s lawyer] .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] is starting to [V: wonder] [ARG1: if it was a mistake to trust an aging , loudmouth New Yorker like Rudy Giuliani with a job as important as president of the United States ’s lawyer] .

Donald Trump is starting to wonder if it [V: was] [ARG2: a mistake] [ARG1: to trust an aging , loudmouth New Yorker like Rudy Giuliani with a job as important as president of the United States ’s lawyer] .

Donald Trump is starting to wonder if it was a mistake to [V: trust] [ARG2: an aging , loudmouth New Yorker like Rudy Giuliani] [ARG1: with a job as important as president of the United States ’s lawyer] .
